content: have you also checked expunge on exit? Disk space in not release until you do that your manually select to compact folders which is becoming ever more difficult.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: As the highlight colors are derived from the operating system theme, just change the setting in your operating system.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Since I just migrated to Windows 11 I knew it had to be the OS or a new install of Thunderbird. Could you please point me to a source where I can learn more about Windows 11 color schemes and how they interact with Thunderbird 136? Thank you.
creator: BobHelms

content: Matt, After I clicked on the Windows Icon, did a search for settings > Personalization > Colors, I then changed "Accent Color" to "Automatic" from "Manual" which had the gray color selected, my issue was resolved. Thanks again for pointing me in the right direction. Bob
creator: BobHelms

content: This is the message I'm getting every time
creator: pourprix.mickael

content: - click account settings - under the desired account on left side, select 'copies&folders' - tick the BCC box and enter email address there
creator: davidsk

content:
Szia!

Mi az az alfiók? Szerintem mappára gondoltál. A Thunderbird főképernyőjén egyszerűen kattints jobb egérgombbal a fiókod nevére, és válaszd a Feliratkozás… lehetőséget. Itt kiválaszthatod az új mappáidat, hogy azokat is szinkronizálja.

Üdv, Balázs
